name: The Ancient Library
lore: Built centuries ago by the Elder Scribes, this magnificent library holds countless tomes of forgotten knowledge. Legend says that those who seek wisdom here may find more than they bargained for.
description: A towering structure of weathered stone and intricate carvings, the Ancient Library stands as a testament to the pursuit of knowledge throughout the ages.

name: Dragon's Peak
lore: The highest point in the realm, shrouded in perpetual mist. Local tales speak of a dragon that once made its lair at the summit, guarding treasures beyond imagination.
description: Jagged peaks pierce the clouds, their slopes treacherous and unforgiving. Few dare to venture to the summit.

name: Mystic Grove
lore: An enchanted forest where the trees whisper secrets to those who listen. The grove is said to be protected by ancient nature spirits who guard its sacred heart.
description: Luminescent fungi light the forest floor, and the air is thick with magic. The trees here are older than memory itself.

name: Port of Echoes
lore: A bustling port town where traders from distant lands converge. It's said that every conversation here echoes with the voices of those who have passed through before.
description: Ships of all sizes crowd the harbor, their sails bearing symbols from kingdoms near and far. The smell of salt and spices fills the air.

name: Sunspire Citadel
lore: Forged from mirrored stone, the citadel reflects the dawn across the southern plains, signaling the start of every Azterran day.
description: Terraced walls encircle slender towers capped with burnished gold, and skybridges link each tier of the metropolis.

name: Shattered Crescent
lore: These ruins were once a moon-temple that exploded outward during a celestial miscast, leaving fragments suspended in slow orbit.
description: Cracked marble arcs jut from the ground while faint, floating shards of stone form a broken halo overhead.

name: Verdant Tide
lore: The tide is a living wall of flora that migrates seasonally, swallowing abandoned forts and sprouting new life in its wake.
description: Massive fronds sweep like waves, bioluminescent spores drift through the undergrowth, and the air hums with unseen creatures.
